rows.title: Why should I choose CoinPort?
rows.content:
CoinPort is an easy, friendly and safe place to trade cryptocurrenct and other digital assets.
CoinPort offers a wide variety of digital assets including the popular coins listed where users can buy, sell and swap benefiting from the lowest fees starting from 0.1%. Trade with peace of mind knowing that CoinPort has the highest level of globally recognised security certification in Australia.
Our friendly Support Team provides premium customer service where users can directly engage with real people 24/7 to assist with any queries.

rows.title: What do I need to get started?
rows.content: Anyone over the age of 16 can open an account with CoinPort; get started with an email address, Australian mobile number & a valid form of ID to verify your account.

rows.title: How do I buy crypto?
rows.content: Buying crypto has never been more convenient. Once account verification has been completed, users are able to choose from a range of free and instant AUD deposit methods such as PayID, Direct deposit & POLi to allocate funds to their account. Once the funds have arrived, head to the buy/sell page where you can instantly purchase any of the assets listed.

rows.title: Where can I get assistance?
rows.content: Click on the bubble in the bottom left corner and speak with our team of Help Desk staff.
